7XH.MU.summary: Rana Gruber AS engages in the mining, production, and sale of iron ore concentrate primarily to steel producers and the chemical industry. The company also offers micronized iron oxides and related products to paint manufactures, and building and automotive industries. It offers its products under the Mo i Rana Concentrates and Colorana brands. The company also exports its products worldwide. Rana Gruber AS was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Mo i Rana, Norway. Rana Gruber AS is a subsidiary of LNS Mining AS.

GEM.OL.summary: Green Minerals AS, a development stage company, engages in the deep sea mining of metals, marine minerals, and rare earth elements. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Bergen, Norway. Green Minerals AS is a subsidiary of Seabird Exploration Plc.

NOM.OL.summary: Nordic Mining ASA, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, extraction, and production of industrial minerals and metals in Norway and internationally. The company primarily explores for rutile, garnet, quartz, lithium/lithium carbonate, and nickel deposits, as well as seabed massive sulfides and other seabed mineral deposits. Its flagship project is the EngebÃ¸ project located in the Naustdal in Sunnfjord municipality in Vestland county on the west coast of Norway. Nordic Mining ASA was founded in 2006 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

RANA.OL.summary: Rana Gruber AS engages in the mining, production, and sale of iron ore concentrate primarily to steel producers and the chemical industry. The company also offers micronized iron oxides and related products to paint manufactures, and building and automotive industries. It offers its products under the Mo i Rana Concentrates and Colorana brands. The company also exports its products worldwide. Rana Gruber AS was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Mo i Rana, Norway. Rana Gruber AS is a subsidiary of LNS Mining AS.
